name: Excuse me, where is the nearest bus stop?
When is the next bus to Berlin?
Is this a direct bus to London?
No, you have to change buses in Paris.
Please, take a seat and fasten your seatbelts.
Does the bus stop at the airport?

Don't get a taxi. There's a night bus.
Where do we need to get off?
